description: This Python script demonstrates how to use the Memory class for persistent memory storage, including initializing a database, adding user memories, and reading stored memories.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Class for managing persistent memory storage and retrieval.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: Class for SQLite database interactions for memory storage.

methods.name: add_user_memory
methods.description: Method to add a user memory record to the database.

methods.name: read_memories
methods.description: Method to read all memory records from the database.
